lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be given the tools I need to succeed. I want to pass on that gift by sharing resources with other hard-working women!

lender.name: Dave & Tonya
lender.loan_because: I'm teaching my kids about charities and giving to others

lender.name: Vaughn
lender.loan_because: It's a cool/unique way to change lives and impact the world positively.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Red Cross in assisting companies that prepare/respond to emergencies and disasters.

lender.name: Nathan and Lana
lender.loan_because: God is Love

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.occupational_info: I build structures for people to both live and work in. I am also starting a business to install solar energy equipment.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: unlike the collection plate,I know where this money is going

lender.name: Ka-Nam
lender.whereabouts: Isle of Man Isle of Man
lender.loan_because: God is probably too busy to help these people.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others is self-help. This is a small world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great program - truly helps without paternalism!
lender.occupational_info: I help citizens express how they want their community to develop and how they want their city to be in the future.

lender.name: Howard & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We believe in sharing, particularly with the most vulnerable in our world. It's also a legacy for our grandchildren and all their generation. We've only just begun.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microfinance. It is one of the most efficient ways to support entrepreneurs with very limited access to credits (i.e. hindering them from being successful)

lender.name: The Warren Family
lender.loan_because: we think it's really a good experience for other people to start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We are students.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I admire and support the entrepreneurial spirit in though circumstances.

lender.name: Cem
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing...

lender.name: Dondi
lender.loan_because: I can. I can help someone else. Maybe someday, they will help another person.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of the bones in your body so the doctor can see what might be wrong.

lender.name: Carmen (LinkCamp.com)
lender.occupational_info: Application development

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I loan, therefore I am.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies, organizations, and individuals solve disputes peacefully.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I like the idea of promoting small business growth on a global basis.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world and helping individuals achieve their dreams can make a difference that continues to grow and spread.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make technology products easy to use and ensure the products help those who use them be successful and also enjoy using them.

lender.name: Family
lender.loan_because: We realize the successful impact that micro-credit loans can have on the lives of people.
lender.occupational_info: We have done work in health care, education, with the government and overseas in Asia and Africa.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Helping others, helps you.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of microfinance to reduce poverty throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people analyze their data.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do...because I'm so blessed...because I enjoy helping others... because I can...because I believe in Karma.
lender.occupational_info: I help write software that runs computers at hospitals.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I too am an entrepeneur and know what it's like not to have money to invest.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: People are working hard and need the help.

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: I feel a responsibility to help others in whatever ways I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a lifeskills coach at a middle school, teaching kids skills they need to handle problems at home and at school.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It gives me a global connection and warms my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the make believe world of film. I place great detail in making costumes for actors to create an imaginary world. So much time and money is spent for entertainment. I love it but also love to participate in the real world of Kiva.

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: I got a voucher for christmas and want to put it to good use.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. We are in the position we are here in America because of people in developing countries and what they have provided us.
lender.occupational_info: High school teacher, father of two.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want others to have their wishes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I direct groups of actors in plays. I work with high school students and adults.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference to real people and not faceless organisations

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It was a great suggestion from my wife :)
lender.occupational_info:
I work for Kwik Trip, Inc., a convenience store chain based in LaCrosse, WI, USA. I deliver gasoline and diesel fuel in a semi truck to our retail locations. I've been happily employed with them since 1988.
The picture is of me at the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore Sea Caves near Bayfield, Wisconsin. Pamela and I love to visit this area of the state!

lender.name: Sue Stock
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary school children.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Savvy
lender.loan_because: This money goes a long way in other parts of the world and I am blessed to have it to lend.
lender.occupational_info: I teach boys with emotional/behavioral challenges in a school located on a campus where the students also live.

lender.name: The mainville kids
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity for my children to help out those in need. I believe this will teach them that it is often better to give then to recieve
lender.occupational_info: I work in a retail store and I supervise the cashiers. My job consists of working a register, dealing with money and having great customer skills.

lender.name: Maddy
lender.loan_because: Because I feel joy when I help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects and provide support for HVAC systems design.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: After working for many years as a journalist and political speechwriter, I am writing my first book.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: BARBARA
lender.loan_because: I want to make an impact on other women who strive to help themselves to achieve a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Three days each week I work at a local hospital in medical education supporting doctors and residents [new doctors learning from experienced doctors] to increase their knowledge and effectiveness as medical doctors.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: I loan because helping people is my favorite part of being alive.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a university library's website, making sure that everyone has access to the information they need.

lender.name: Stieg
lender.loan_because: People helping People

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: The meek shall inherit the earth
lender.occupational_info: I load military aircraft with cargo and passengers...Sometimes that is a good thing, and others it isn't

lender.name: Erlend
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves. I prefer micro-loans compared to the big organizations because I get a better overview and I am guaranteed that the money will not dissaper in administration costs.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a sports analyzer and as a 2nd league football club journalist.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I got this lovely christmas gift and gonna spread the word around.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own company, I work with people and treat them for their health.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe every human being deserves the best life possible. Poverty and hunger should not exist in a world that does have plenty for all. I love the whole concept of mircolending, and helping people help themselves out of poverty. This gives hope and purpose. I am actually aspiring to work in economic development through a non-profit like Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work on heating, cooling, and ventilation systems in buildings. But I would love to work for economic development through a non-profit like Kiva.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy way to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I study in order to develop communities and cities to grow in a more sustainable way.

lender.name: Shannon and Tasha
lender.loan_because: we want to help women live their dreams, to be autonomous and to be able to support their children.

lender.name: Worthy Family
lender.loan_because: To be of service.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help other women and their families to prosper through their own work and through cooperation with other people in their community.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I know you can acheive your dreams and I hope I can help.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kaitlyn
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student in California. I hope to study either economics, or economic and environmental policy.

lender.name: Veronique
lender.loan_because: I can and to make a difference.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a hand some time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students the Spanish language and teach them about Latin American literature and cultures.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Its for a wonderful cause!
lender.occupational_info: Well, i'm in year 9 and i sing and learn the trumpet. I also want to start learning the piano. I think this organisation is an incredable idea and im all for it! =)

lender.name: Erin Emilia
lender.loan_because: We're all in it together...
lender.occupational_info: I work in pediatrics and with the underserved population needing healthcare.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: ... Kiva provides me an opportunity to help people help themselves. The great thing about this is that small amounts of money can help people over and over maximizing ones impact.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes for a living.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help build the things that make our countries "developed".

lender.name: Galen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Student.

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupational_info: I produce/write/direct films. You can see them on my website.

lender.name: robin
lender.occupation: student and in love with the world

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I would like to support people with good ideas about how to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I assist a local veterinarian in providing health care to pets and livestock.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: My daughter and son-in-law introduced me to Kiva for Christmas this year. They know about my passion for business and mentoring entrepreneurs. They also know about my love of travel and meeting new people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I spent my career as an executive in various companies including General Electric and Universal Foods. I worked in both sales and the development of international business ventures. Today I manage several home based business that are primarily health focused. In my spare time, I mentor small business owners through SCORE.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I'm so grateful for those who have helped me in the past when I really needed it. I hope I can do the same and make someone's life a little easier and hopefully, a little happier.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a child advocate to improve our laws and legal system to protect and provide all children with equal access to food, water, healthcare, education, and the opportunity to live up to their full potential.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have an opportunity for a better life and we should all help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Univeristy and support the online technology and equipment.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be great everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I start businesses to help people and the planet. My current company, the Hoop Fund, combines microloans with ethical purchasing & fair trade, to connect consumers to the people who make their products.

lender.name: Maurielle
lender.loan_because: I love helping people and this is an easy way to do that. It's so interesting to see all types of businesses from all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate volunteers within a hospital.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I believe this provides the most help for the buck.
lender.occupational_info: I fabricate fabulous bifurcated flanges.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want people to know they can plan for a better future and there are others that can help. Soon those that receive the loans will be able to loan to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical laboratory and provide the information to the doctors to help treat patients.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Pay It Forward!

lender.name: Mia & Hannah
lender.loan_because: we like to help people who need extra help
lender.occupational_info: school students

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It aligns better with my life philosophy than do a series of "hard to account for" handouts.
lender.occupational_info: Political advisor

lender.name: matt + abby
lender.loan_because: we can. We're constantly reminded of how good we have it and want to share so someone else might have similar opportunities for themselves, their families and their community.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: My sister in law introduced me to Kiva for Christmas this year because she knows that I am interested in helping people around the world.

lender.name: Takahiro
lender.loan_because: "Lends to the Lord"
lender.occupational_info: Advise to my customer about his IT system works better.

lender.name: judith
lender.occupation: teacher of InterPlay, and autistic students

lender.name: EMN
lender.loan_because: I've benefited from loans myself

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because He first loved us.
lender.occupational_info: I find, interview, and hire people who are seeking jobs.

lender.name: Greyson
lender.loan_because: We're all on this planet together.
lender.occupational_info: I study polymer engineering.

lender.name: Jeni
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of one person helping another to help themselves. I like that Kiva lends money for those that want to work hard and improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach all subjects to elementary students. I am assigned a grade level yearly. The students range in age from 4 years to 12 years old.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I'm a philanthropist at heart and want to change the world for the better.

lender.name: The Outtersons
lender.loan_because: it's awesome.

lender.name: Joubin & Vahishta
lender.loan_because: Live simply so that others might simply live
lender.occupational_info: Eternal Optimists

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: like to see others enjoy the success in life that I have had this last year.I sale my pottery at market and a local retail store.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small retail store , I go to gift shows and purchase items to sale , once I receive the items I price and display in the store.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver merchandise by air.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to see more people become self-sufficient

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I lived in Peru for two years and know of the many needs in third world countries.

lender.name: Craig Lewis
lender.loan_because: To help uplift the downtrodden. Humanity is one family. Whether it is by governments, social status, race, gender or poverty, no one is free when others are oppressed.
lender.occupational_info: I am the administrator of an academic division in a community college (called a university in some countries).
